bike.description: Specialized E5 SLX aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld semi-compact Freeroad design, FACT carbon seatstays w/ Zertz inserts, rack and fender fittings

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, monocoque construction, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Speed Zertz, rack and fender fittings
Specialized Mindset, 1-1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, 25mm alloy cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
